div.div:
* Next Booster Club Meeting will be February 24, 2020 due to President's Day Holiday. Remaining Meetings: March 16, 2020 April 20, 2020 May 18, 2020
*Booster Club Meeting Minutes
December 2019
January 2019
Booster Club Meetings are held on the 3rd Monday of each month. All are welcome to attend the meeting, but you must be a member in order to vote. Membership dues are $40 per family for the year. Membership applications are still available and can be found on the school website or in the main office. Please come show your support!
Booster Membership Form

span.data-emptytext: Vance Charter School provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Vance Charter School is accredited by AdvancED (Formerly SACS) First Charter school in North Carolina and the only public elementary/middle school in Vance County to be (SACS) accredited.

p.span: Vance Charter School is accredited by AdvancED (Formerly SACS) First Charter school in North Carolina and the only public elementary/middle school in Vance County to be (SACS) accredited.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
